messages.content: can you translate and tell me what's on here?
All the files uploaded by the user have been fully loaded. Searching won't provide additional information.

The document is an official letter from the **PrÃ©fecture du Nord** in France, dated **May 12, 2025**, regarding the residency application of **Bilal Saad Ghalib**. Hereâ€™s a clear translation and summary of the contents:

---

**Subject:** Urgent Request (RÃ©fÃ©rÃ©) No. 2502663  
**Reference:** GHALIB Bilal Saad

Dear MaÃ®tre Lesaffre (lawyer),

Following the urgent request (rÃ©fÃ©rÃ©) submitted on behalf of your client, Mr. Bilal Saad Ghalib, regarding the **non-issuance of a receipt (rÃ©cÃ©pissÃ©)** after submitting his **residence permit renewal request**, I note that:

> **Your client still has not scheduled a new appointment to pick up his residence permit.**

You received an **automatic acknowledgment email** on **April 30, 2025**, which contained a **link to book an appointment**.

According to the **electronic scheduling system** of the prefecture:

> ðŸ“Œ It is **mandatory** for your client to **personally choose** a new appointment.

Due to high rates of missed appointments, the prefecture **no longer assigns fixed appointments**, but instead allows users to **select a time slot that suits them best.**

Kind regards,  
On behalf of the Prefect and by delegation,  
**AmÃ©lie BOUCART**, Legal Officer, Immigration and Foreign Nationals Legal Affairs Bureau

---

**In short:**
You (Bilal) need to **book an appointment online yourself** using the link provided in the **automated email from April 30** in order to collect your renewed residence permit. The prefecture won't schedule it for you.

Would you like help finding the original email or accessing the booking link?
